control.visible: [substring(ListItem.FileExtension,iso) | substring(ListItem.FileExtension,img) | substring(ListItem.FilenameAndPath,dvd) | substring(ListItem.FileExtension,ifo) | substring(ListItem.FileExtension,vob) | substring(ListItem.FilenameAndPath,dvdrip) | substring(ListItem.FilenameAndPath,dvdr5) | substring(ListItem.FilenameAndPath,.r5) | substring(ListItem.FilenameAndPath,dvdscreener) | substring(ListItem.FilenameAndPath,dvdscr) | substring(ListItem.FilenameAndPath,screener)] + ![substring(ListItem.FilenameAndPath,hddvd) | substring(ListItem.FilenameAndPath,hd-dvd)]

substring(ListItem.VideoCodec,divx) | substring(ListItem.VideoCodec,div2) | substring(ListItem.VideoCodec,div3) | substring(ListItem.VideoCodec,div4) | substring(ListItem.VideoCodec,divx 4) | substring(ListItem.VideoCodec,div5) | substring(ListItem.VideoCodec,dx50)

[substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,.iso,Right) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,.img,Right) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,dvd) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,.ifo,Right) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,.vob,Right) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,dvdrip) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,dvdr5) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,.r5) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,dvdscreener) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,dvdscr) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,screener)] + ![substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,hddvd) | substring(Player.FilenameAndPath,hd-dvd)]

substring(VideoPlayer.VideoCodec,divx) | substring(VideoPlayer.VideoCodec,div2) | substring(VideoPlayer.VideoCodec,div3) | substring(VideoPlayer.VideoCodec,div4) | substring(VideoPlayer.VideoCodec,divx 4) | substring(VideoPlayer.VideoCodec,div5) | substring(VideoPlayer.VideoCodec,dx50)
